content:
While looking for something else I've found out:

(1) The first issue by @quicksketch was filed on Sep 3, 2013 - two years before Backdrop was officially born.
(2) The earliest PR was created by @quicksketch on Sep 1, 2013
(3) The earliest PR that is still Open was created by @rszrama on Jun 5, 2015

Import the Sources · Issue #1 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
We need to find a suitable location in history from which to begin our repository. We definitely want pre-Drupal Kernel and the PSR-0 namespacing, but at the same time we'd like at least a reas...
Implement Travis CI by quicksketch · Pull Request #8 · backdrop/backdrop
Pull request to implement Travis CI as a testing framework for Issue #6. Some adjustments had to be made to run-tests.sh script to properly use the STDERR stream so that errors would actually regis...
Issue #972: add a getController() public function to the Entity abstract class. by rszrama · Pull Request #938 · backdrop/backdrop
cf. backdrop/backdrop-issues#972

Commits of busy day of January 15, 2015 are on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/commits/1.x?after=fc38836bee1e52d247c241e2f384af0e0e67baa6+2589&branch=1.x and https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/commits/1.x?after=fc38836bee1e52d247c241e2f384af0e0e67baa6+2589&branch=1.x
